views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 8, 9, 10 and 11

BounceReachability gives you Different Custom Bounce and Speed Effects Animations for the Reachability Compatible Devices.

More Features and Improvements in the Works.

Configure options from Settings.

See Screenshots below.

The Tweak is out of Stage from my Repository with the Custom Speeding Values, Revisited Preferences and More Feature added too.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!

Version 1.0.3 - Tested and Working Fine also on iOS 11 (Download Enabled). Version 1.0.2
- Added the option to Make Reachability Not Going Out of Time (tip by prouser).
Version 1.0.1
- Added the option to Select the Spring Reachability Effect.
